rorgmod:Abstract Rorg Relic.NAME: ERROR RELIC
rorgmod:Abstract Rorg Relic.FLAVOR: RorgMod went wrong! Please tell @prod#0339 at STS Discord.
DESCRIPTIONS: RorgMod went wrong! Please tell @prod#0339 at STS Discord.

rorgmod:Loose Gear.NAME: Loose Gear
rorgmod:Loose Gear.FLAVOR: Percussive maintenance may damage the automaton, though it does work.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you lose HP each combat, gain #b2 Orb Slots.

rorgmod:Glossy Coat.NAME: Glossy Coat
rorgmod:Glossy Coat.FLAVOR: "Apply a second coat for the best results!" -Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy applies #yWeak or #yVulnerable to you, apply the same debuff to ALL enemies.

rorgmod:Coolant Medium.NAME: Coolant Medium
rorgmod:Coolant Medium.FLAVOR: "Be careful not to let your automaton overheat!" - Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: If you rested at the last Rest Site, gain #b4 additional Orb slots at the start of each combat.

rorgmod:Data Disk.NAME: Data Disk
rorgmod:Data Disk.FLAVOR: This disk contains precious data on slimes and shoobs.

rorgmod:Decaying Core.NAME: Decaying Core
rorgmod:Decaying Core.FLAVOR: "Your time runs low. Find the Prime." -Unknown
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, apply #b1 #yVulnerable.

rorgmod:Crooked Motherboard.NAME: Crooked Motherboard
rorgmod:Crooked Motherboard.FLAVOR: Your programming rewrites itself and your wires reform; the dawn of a new you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card debuffs you, gain #b1 #yArtifact.

rorgmod:Liquid Mercury.NAME: Liquid Mercury
rorgmod:Liquid Mercury.FLAVOR: Electricity flows through your toxic veins.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply #b1 #yVulnerable to ALL enemies if you have #yPlasma Channeled.

rorgmod:Empty Cage.NAME: Empty Cage
rorgmod:Empty Cage.FLAVOR: "How unusual to cage that which you worship." - Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, remove #b3 cards from your deck.

rorgmod:Crimson Lotus.NAME: Crimson Lotus
rorgmod:Crimson Lotus.FLAVOR: Rarest color of a lotus, Old texts describe that it only blooms in the hardest of times.

rorgmod:Black Star.NAME: Black Star
rorgmod:Black Star.FLAVOR: Originally discovered in the town of the serpent, beside a solitary candle.

rorgmod:Ceramic Fish.NAME: Ceramic Fish
rorgmod:Ceramic Fish.FLAVOR: Meticulously painted, these fish were revered to bring great fortune.

rorgmod:The Boot.NAME: The Boot
rorgmod:The Boot.FLAVOR: When wound up, the boot grows larger in size.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would deal #b5 or less unblocked attack damage, increase it to #b6.

rorgmod:Short Circuit.NAME: Short Circuit
rorgmod:Short Circuit.FLAVOR: Limited in capacity, but makes up for this in potency.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yRetain your hand on the first turn of each combat.
